name: Fjallraven Ovik Nordic Sweater - Men's
description:
Explore backroads on fall days in this warm wool sweater. Named after Fjällräven’s home town, the Ovik collection offers timeless scandi style that wears well.Knit from soft, traceable wool.Elbows reinforced with rugged G-1000 Eco.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.
